description:
Describes the billing details of an entity.
This has properties like name,organization,address,email,phone,time,tax_number, created_at,updated_at

organization.description: Details of the organization being billed.

address.description: The address of the billable entity

state.description: The state where the billable entity resides. This is important for state-level tax calculation

city.description: The city where the billable entity resides.

email.description: Email address where the bill is sent to

phone.description: Phone number of the billable entity

tax_id.description: ID of the billable entity as recognized by the taxation authority
